caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For QE Sept 30, 2024. Board Meeting Intimation for Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results For QE Sept 30, 2024
fullText: V B Industries Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 11/11/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results for QE Sept 30, 2024

caption: Updates on Open Offer
fullText: Navigant Corporate Advisors Ltd ("Manager to the Offer") has submitted to BSE a copy of Offer Opening Public Announcement to the Shareholders of Western Ministil Ltd ("Target Company").

caption: Compliances-Reg. 39 (3) - Details of Loss of Certificate / Duplicate Certificate
fullText: Please refer the attached intimation for issue of Letter of Confirmation in lieu of share certificate reported lost/misplaced.

caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations, 2018
fullText: PLEASE FIND ATTACHED CERTIFICATE UNDER REG 74(5)
